content: अविरत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not desisting or ceasing from (with <ab>abl.</ab>); uninterrupted, continual, unbroken, perpetual; अविरतोत्कंठमुत्कंठितेन <ls>Me. 102</ls>; Prov. मंदोप्यविरतोद्योगः सदैव विजयी भवेत् ‘slow and steady wins the race’. {@--2@} Abandoned. --तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Eternally, continually; अविरतं परकार्यकृतां सतां <ls>Bv. 1. 113.</ls>
